items.sentence: You might get injured if you do that the way Tom told you to.
The airplane crashed about three kilometers from the airport.
I\'ve already told Tom about the problems we\'ve been having.
I was surprised when I heard Tom and Mary had gotten married.
Tom can\'t do the job by himself. Would you mind helping him?
Tom certainly couldn\'t have thought up this plan by himself.
I think that it\'s unlikely Tom will come to the party alone.
Though Tom and Mary are twins, they don\'t look very similar.
I wonder whether or not Tom knew that Mary couldn\'t do that.
Tom called Mary and found out she wasn\'t planning on coming.
